website_summaries.verdict: If you need a dehumidifier for a small space, this is a great choice, but it won't do much in larger rooms.
pros: We love the whisper-quiet thermo-electric technology
cons: Only suitable for small rooms around 110 square feet or less

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding performance
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! I bought it for my bathroom which is shared by 4 people in an old house. The bathroom doesn't get any air circulating and the exhaust fan is useless. My towels take forever to dry and then they start to smell. Mi also am constantly cleaning mildew off the walls. After a month of using this dehumidifier I'm am so pleased! No mildew or smelly towels!, it is so quiet you don't even realize it's on. Easy to use. Easy to empty the tray of water. Would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Little Machine!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these little machines for our 33 ft RV in which we live in Central Texas. We also have a washer/dryer combo, so this winter our RV was constantly damp. After reading the reviews, I placed the order. Within one day of receiving them, these little machines had each collected a half cup of water, a total of one cup! Now we no longer have a humidity problem! One of the best things I've ever ordered! Update: For purchasing these two machines, the company sent me a Liztek 4-port charger, of which one is a super charger.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Edenfield

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - product stopped working within replacement period and company is not responding my messages.
customer_reviews.text: Update - Gurin finally contacted me and sent the replacement! Happy to have this back on 5 stars. The dehumidifier stopped working after 9 months. I've attempted to contact Gurin via amazon, Gurin website, email and phone - 7 times over a period of 2 months. It stopped working February 2018, well within the one year replacement period. They have not responded. Very disappointed in the company. Their online warranty clearly states they will replace/refund any defective product within a one year warranty period.
customer_reviews.author: S. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Camper usage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Gurin Thermo-Electric Dehumidifier- 1100 cubit feet for our camper. This is the best investment I have made thus far for my camper. The machine was 1/2 full in 2 days. I have purchase the hanging bags for over a year... however, I will not ever purchase another hanging bag. The Gurin is the best at removing the moisture from the camper. I have the confidence this machine is going to service the needs of removing the moisture with no problems. I recommend the dehumidifier for your camper or small room.... I have a 28 foot camper by the way.
customer_reviews.author: Pops at work

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: So far, we received the Gurin de-humidifier, pieced it together in about 2 minute, plugged it in, and it immediately started pulling water in our bathroom. We have had trouble with the "pink mold" in the shower, and since I plugged this thing it, it hasn't been back. It has been running whisper quiet, and removing water from the air as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Rudolph Cassol

customer_reviews.title: Gurin Dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: Unit appears well made. Take it out of the box and plug it in. I use it in a small bathroom and it works great. The clear water container allows you to see how much water it collects. I’m amazed to see how well this small unit works. It’s fairly quiet too. One button simple operation and the water tank pulls out the front for easy emptying. If I did it over again I would buy the Home version of this unit instead of the Gurin simply for looks as the “Home” is written on the bottom of their unit rather than the “Gurin” printed large at the top of this one.
customer_reviews.author: TRUMP 2020

customer_reviews.title: This works for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I haven't found the best space to use this in. My "garden level" apartment was getting damp and not really wanting to spend money on a larger dehumidifier, I figured I would give this a try. It definitely works and pulls moisture out of the air, but it is best for small spaces (closet, maybe a small bathroom). This also needs time to run in order to be effective. I'm not unhappy with it, but I did have to buy a 70-Qt dehumidifier for my space. There was too much to be done for this little dude.
customer_reviews.author: L. Corriveau

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased several of these for closets. Works well and lowers humidity, but, after less than a year, 2 of the units quit working completely. However, upon posting my review, the company contacted me and worked with me to get both units working. They sent me replacement cords, which fixed one of the units, then, they completely replaced the other unit, all at no cost to me. All of the units I have work quite well and do what they are made to do. Any product can have problem, but, it is how the company works to resolve the issue that is most important. They handled everything very well and I am completely satisfied. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: G O H

customer_reviews.title: I was having issues with silverfish (which like humidity) and warping trading cards (which don't like humidity)
customer_reviews.text: I was having issues with silverfish (which like humidity) and warping trading cards (which don't like humidity). I put one of these where I keep my trading cards. It doesn't pull a lot out of the air (I don't have to dump it often), but I haven't noticed any more warping or silverfish since shortly after getting it, sooo... I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Small but effective
customer_reviews.text: This is a small device and very easy to use. Mostly one just turns it on and off. For its size it has a rather large water holding cup, and it really does take water out of the air. I live in a hot and humid climate, and have this on my home office desk. After an hour or so after first turning it on, I saw that there was water already in the cup, so this thing does work. I'm surprised at just how much water it does remove from the air. Just pop out the cup to pour out the water and pop it in again and turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had it three months now and it has been perfect. Has been 5 months now and the original plus 3 others I bought have worked flawlessly. Best product I ever bought. Can't believe we wasted so much money on "Damprid" all these years. When I see the amount of water that the Gurin extracts from our closet, I realize those crystals they sell are worthless. I have to empty all four of my Gurins twice a week. So far the mildew has nor returned. I received no discount on the product. Wish they would offer one though as I would buy another two units!
customer_reviews.author: Captain Nemo

customer_reviews.title: hardly pulls any moisture, even after days of use
customer_reviews.text: I put this into an area that normally easily gets 45 quarts per day pulled out of it, and after two days of use, it had only pulled 8 oz. I looked to see what humidity level the 45-qt dehumidifier was reading in the room, and it was way up there, so it's not that there was no moisture in the room. This is indeed very cute and pretty quiet, but, at least the one I got, is not good if you need any significant dehumidification.
customer_reviews.author: Feather

customer_reviews.title: I do love this product
customer_reviews.text: I do love this product. I purchased three of them for a small apartment in Crestview, FL. My hope was that I could keep the cost of AC down by having a few of these around the house. It definitely helped to keep some of the humidity out of the air. Although after about 6 months, one of the three stopped working. I still believe that this is a very good product for small spaces. We are still running the other two with no problems. We have to change them out about twice a weeks and has helped to keep our bill down.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Been through 2 in 17 months
customer_reviews.text: First one only lasted 7 months. Company sent another one. This one only lasted 10 months. Doesn't make any sense because it's only on about 45 minutes a day in a bathroom. I'm pitching it amd trying a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: It's a Burgh Thing

customer_reviews.title: BAD COMMUNICATION FOR HELP
customer_reviews.text: This item, while looks nice, I was not able to use. The power cord DOES NOT fit in to the back of the unit. I moved and was not able to use in the time frame to be able to return. When I first tried to use it and realized the power cord is too big (AND NO IT'S NOT USER ERROR -- IT'S MANUFACTURING ISSUE), I tried to contact Amazon to help me. They only provided the email and phone number of the company. I contacted the company and have RECEIVED NO response as of yet. I'm left with a nice-looking dehumidifier that can't be used. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene May

customer_reviews.title: Good Unit but Breaks Quickly
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 4 of these over the last year and 2 have already broken. I live in my parents' basement (thanks Obama) so moisture is always an issue. I have a large dehumidifier but it's noisy, so I mostly run that when not immediately next to it. I've got 4 of these smaller ones throughout. They are very quiet and don't pull as much water, but they are good enough for when I don't want the noise. But will search for something else so I don't have to buy new ones every 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Rishi

customer_reviews.title: Happy enough with the first one to get a second one...
customer_reviews.text: It works great. We use it to keep a cupboard full of fabric dry. It stops automatically when the container needs to be emptied - and it empties very easily. Our first one lasted ~2 years. I'd expected longer but after trying another alternative and being very disappointed, I'm back to get another one of these. If it had lasted longer it would have been 5 stars. A really fine little unit.
customer_reviews.author: Sue R.

customer_reviews.title: It works, I am not getting very much condensation on our windows in the bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a small area, we are in a motorhome and use it in our bedroom, it really pulls the moisture out of the room. The negatives, it isn't as quiet as I would like, luckily I wear ear plugs so not a problem for me, it doesn't bother my husband at all. That green light, geez, I'm sure it could beam to Mars, covered it up with 2 pieces of wasi tape and can still see that light, duck tape next. We are happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a medium-sized bedroom or similar space. One of our bedrooms seems to get more moisture than the rest of the house and, since it's a guest room, it's closed up most of the time. I run this dehumidifier 24/7 in it traps a lot of water. I have to empty the tank weekly during the spring, winter, and fall! Also, they offer great customer service via email if you ever have a need for support.
customer_reviews.author: Dana513

customer_reviews.title: Great product  simply awesome
customer_reviews.text: At first when I got this product, I thought what gonna do this little thing. It’s smaller than I thought. anyway wanted to tested before I return it , so I leave it on in my basement for couple of days and I see the change . The mustiness in my basement is gone. No odor in my basement at all . I am so happy with it .
customer_reviews.author: SOHEL AHMED

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Small, compact & does what it’s meant to do. We live on a boat. That really helps! But wouldn’t be enough by itself for the entire boat in Florida. It’s not magical. Im very happy with it and will buy a second one for the bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Kanukontheroad

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work at all - dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: this doesn't work AT ALL! Is taking no humidity out of the air. Our weather in PA has been 90% humidity and this is not even filled half way in several days of running. A piece of junk. Going to return this and try the Germ Guardian one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great simple tech!
customer_reviews.text: I used it in my camper during a rain period and it has worked surprisingly well. Great simple technology and takes only about 20 watts of energy. I leave it on 24/7 and makes my RV feel so much better inside. Great product and I absolutely recommend for vans, campers or RV-s.
customer_reviews.author: Rommi

customer_reviews.title: Good little dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: I put this next to my bed when it gets too humid. I hate feeling soggy. It's not going to dehumidify an entire apartment, but it will definitely help in a smaller room. It's very quiet. You can see it working as it collects water in the clear tub. My only minor complaint is that I use this in the summer and it expels a stream of hot air from the top, which I suspect contributes to the uncomfortable warmth in the room.
customer_reviews.author: freeform23Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet, worry free, space-saving gadget
customer_reviews.text: What a cute little gadget! Using it in the bathroom regularly helps keep the room feeling dry even after daily showering. Works slowly but helps in rooms with no airflow or just a fan. Takes about 2 days to even get half full and the auto shutoff makes it worry free. EXTREMELY QUIET! Nice bonus: white noise when used in the master bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: HarleyJules

customer_reviews.title: Works great and very quiet!
customer_reviews.text: As previous reviews state, it is very quiet. Much quieter than the ones with the compressors and are loud. I was skeptic at first, but tried it out in my kitchen prior to putting into my camper. Sure enough, there was water in the collection tank. This is exactly what I need for the humid summer days when our 30’ camper is not in use. The compact size is perfect for the camper also.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Slightly quieter than previous one.
customer_reviews.text: Good performance, small enough to be fit almost anywhere. Have not had long enough to comment on durability. I use it in my motor home. All of these types have too small a water container for constant use, so I drill a hole midway up container and insert plastic tubing, secure with aquarium silicone, and stick the tube into the sink drain. That way it can run continuously without having to empty every other day. The last one I had worked great for two years, then died, but it kept the motor home from smelling musty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less efficient than I hoped
customer_reviews.text: This product runs very quietly, but is not very speedy at removing humidity. I have used it in rooms with up to 75% humidity and it takes several days to remove enough water to dump out and there is no noticeable difference. That is disappointing as I expected it to be more efficient. Probably would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Clarice D. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Works way better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Works better than expected. I bought this when i thought our bathroom fan was going out and would need something to help till i could get it replaced. Funny thing is once i started using this the fan not only stopped making the weird notice it was making but its now working better than it has in almost 15 years. I would gladly recommend this to anyone with a bit if an over hydration problem in a part of there home.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Lux

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product,
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit for a small room in my basement where I make soap. I noticed that some of my soap had dew developing on them. I decided to try a dehumidifier and found this one with very good reviews and a good price. I cannot believe how much water this little unit pulled out of the air. I could feel a difference when I walked into the room after only two days. I’ve had It about a week and the dew is gone off the soap. This is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great until it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: It broke after less than six months. Just stopped working ORIGINAL REVIEW: It takes about four days to fill the small tank. It's quiet. Our bathroom has a fan already, but this helps keep the room fresh. This will NOT replace a bathroom fan or dehumidify a bedroom. It will supplement a bathroom fan or handle a small enclosed space.
customer_reviews.author: SerenePDX

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing how much water is in that small space
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well in my closet. It's amazing how much water is in that small space! My only complaint is I have a problem with the adapter getting very hot. I notified the company when the emailed to ask about my satisfaction. They said they would respond in two days. It has been almost a week and I received no response. I told them that I am concerned about a possible fire hazard, but it seems like they aren't that concerned.
customer_reviews.author: RACHEL

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dehumidifier! I purchased 2 of this brand and one of another. The other was more expensive and had a bigger tank. I figured I would compare the two products. Both of the Gurin humidifiers collected more water than the bigger, more expensive product. I highly recommend this product. I just recently purchased a third from this company! Great product! Highly, highly, highly recommend this product for anyone looking for a dehumidifier.
customer_reviews.author: CJL

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great luttle dehumidifier, I bought this to use for a meat curing chamber and it works really really well for that I have it in the seven cubic foot chest freezer and it's probably a little bit too small for that one it's loaded with sausage nothing
customer_reviews.author: Tomas Calderone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small space.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, easy set up. Small, discreet and quiet unit. Using in a small (10x10) basement bedroom that was starting to smell moldy/mildewy. After a couple of days there was great improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: After one week this item works as advertised. Arrived in a couple days on time. Quiet and removes humidity just fine. Only had it for a short time but I can say works very well. Placed in a bathroom with poor ventilation of shower of a 1922 house. Unknown durability due to just got it a short time ago.
customer_reviews.author: James M

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second unit I've purchased. The first one I bought still works, its just the adapter that burned out. I wish there was a way just to replace the adapter. The unit itself is great. I use it in a closet that gets no ventilation. I live in a coastal area, so it gets used pretty much everyday and does a great job keeping the damp out of my clothes. The four star for durability is only because I wish there was a way to buy an adapter replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use but it's not effective at all even in a 35 square ft closet.
customer_reviews.author: Humberto Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Had to return it. Not a true dehumidifier. ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it. Not a true dehumidifier. It will remove water from the air, but it would not lower the humidity of a 640 cubic foot space.
customer_reviews.author: mac

customer_reviews.title: Fungus no more
customer_reviews.text: I use the dehumidifier to dry out my climbing shoes. I do a lot of indoor rock climbing and me feet gets sweaty and funky. The dehumidifier also prevents my bathroom walls from getting moldy. Great product
customer_reviews.author: LTHB

customer_reviews.title: Good product, Great service
customer_reviews.text: Good product, Great service! This little machine serves me in two ways. Reduces the humidity in the room I store my tools in, and provides me with a supply of distilled water which I use to formulate a Nasal Rinse Solution which I use. Pays for itself over time!! I can also use the water in our steam iron!!!
customer_reviews.author: Old Jim

customer_reviews.title: Works well - Possible issue with longevity.
customer_reviews.text: Good working product, the only negative is that in previous units of the same model, the power supply fails after 1-2 years. The unit still functions, but I've had to splice the power connector with a higher ampacity source of the same voltage. Hopefully this issue has been resolved in current models. This is the third unit I've purchased for use in small spaces, and they seem to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Hans Schober

customer_reviews.title: it seems work fine in term of slowly lowering the humidity
customer_reviews.text: bought two for my kids' bathroom. it seems work fine in term of slowly lowering the humidity. I don't think it works in a highly humid environment. it dehumidifies pretty slowly. with help from the bathroom fan and bathroom size, it helps....
customer_reviews.author: Hardy P.

customer_reviews.title: I'm so disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I regret purchasing this. I bought it and kept it in my bathroom to try and keep the humidity down after showers but I would run it for a few hours afterward and still only get about half a teaspoon of water collected. I ran it yesterday for 24 hours in the hallway between three bedrooms and the bathroom and it literally had about five drops of water at the end. I'm so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jourdan

customer_reviews.title: Slow filling
customer_reviews.text: Not as efficient as I thought. We use it in the front cab of our RV during winter camping. Collects water but takes many days to fill.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: A nice Toy but nothing more !
customer_reviews.text: It works but not for a high humidity area, works maybe for a small closet, not even near 1100 square foot. May be good for 110 square foot. The problem with these kind of humidifiers is the surface that comes in contact with the air flow. It is so small compare to compressor dehumidifiers that its really only a toy to display in a bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Wechsler

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing to see how much water can be extracted from the air we breath!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Gurin Thermo Electric Dehumidifer to place in our trailer to extract moisture from our RV. The RV dealership sold us a small granule absorbing device, but this little machine shows the results! In just one day I extracted over 8 ounces of water from just the air we breath inside our trailer. We have a larger one in our home and it's great to see this one do as great a job to help keep our RV dry! Jim A
customer_reviews.author: Katie A.

customer_reviews.title: Happy solution with good results.
customer_reviews.text: This works great in my daughters large bedroom. In the first week, it was emptied 3 times. Runs silently.She has a small fan in a corner to give some circulation to the air in the room. I also bought a digital hydrometer to check the room and it has moved 2 degrees lower. This was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Previously Used Unit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these in the same order, but only one of them worked although the packaging appears as though the product was used. The second dehumidifier didn't work at all. A little shake and the light and whisper comes on, but turns off after a short time. I removed the water drawer and looked inside, and it appears the machine was previously used because there was calcium built up on the unit. The product description doesn't say anything about used or refurbished, so I'm not sure why I'd receive an obviously used unit. No sure that I could recommend this product as you may receive a used unit.
customer_reviews.author: R. Loe

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes the best things don’t come in small boxes
customer_reviews.text: It takes forever to get any water in it, I bought two thinking they would be awesome in our camper, I would send them back but I didn’t keep the boxes??? We ended up bringing in our big one from the house;(
customer_reviews.author: Carol olson

customer_reviews.title: Good for small closed off areas.
customer_reviews.text: It does work and it is quiet. However, my humidity level does not change because of it. I probably got about 2 ounces per day. I just need something bigger. I will use it this winter in my small bedroom and keep the door closed. If you house is open to several rooms it will not be effective, it must be used in a small closed area. I like the simplicity of it though, and it is very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Remund

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these little guys and the work great. One is in my office and it had made a huge difference. The air quality is improved. My paperwork doesn't stick together like it did. I'm just so impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Forsyth

customer_reviews.title: USA made / great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far. I live in a 30 ft 5th wheel and this little machine works great in the bathroom/shower/hallway which happens to be the peak of our trailer. I can notice that the air is much less humid, especially after showers. And this little baby is apparently made in good ol USA which makes me super happy!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Really great while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this little dehumidifier and have had happy success with it until today. A little over a year and it's dead.I'm very disappointed, as it was quiet and really worked well but I just can't help but think that a product should not break down just a little over a year.
customer_reviews.author: chibimaddy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy for a grow tent not powerful enough to make a difference
customer_reviews.text: Well I have a 4by4 grow tent and the humidity was reaching to around 70 percent I bought this hoping it would knock it down to 50 rh but it really hasn’t made a difference yet it’s filled up the tank half way though in 4 days but It’s not powerful enough for a grow tent
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Quiet and Affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Had it a week now. It started pulling water right away. Very compact and very quiet. I have it right next to me at night and I barely hear it. Highly recommend for small spaces; bathroom, closet, kitchen. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: K. Failes

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it's worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It's small, and quiet. Cons: I've had it about a year and I'm pretty sure it doesn't work very well any more. I'm unimpressed.
customer_reviews.author: dcrach

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Really for a very, very small space (e.g., closet). Otherwise, it just barely makes any difference. Much more effective models for reducing humidity, even at this size; however, this is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: 6 months of non-stop use and It still performs like my Rolex
customer_reviews.text: This tiny dehumidifier works perfectly, I have one in each bedroom to help allergies. It is quiet enough at night, and I personally taped the green light as we run this non-stop. In my environment it takes about 8 days to full the water which for its size I think is good enough. If it helps, I use this side by side with an Air purifier to help my child allergies, which has now almost dissappear.
customer_reviews.author: DIAZ LIFE

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have a larger dehumidifier that is difficult to empty, so I went back to this smaller one for my study. It’s much better—works well and is easy to empty.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Good for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an RV to help reduce condensation. This thing really pulls the moisture out of the air. After just a few days it filled the tank about 3/4 full. I’m monitoring the humidity level and it has lowered it a few points already. Pretty quiet and has an automatic shut off when the tank gets full.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J. Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Reliable (Typ.)
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for almost 3 years now. The product typically lasts for one year. Why do I like it: its quiet, effective, prevents mold in my closet - water need to be poured out from machine every 3 days, compact and easily fits in an unusable nook Why don't I like it: customer service - for the most part, this product is really good, but out of all (10) of them I have experience ONE glitch machine where the top part kind of melted one month in, giving off some plastic smell and it stopped working. I turned off the machine immediately and informed customer service but have not heard back.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret N.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little machine. I have 2 for myself & have bought 1 for a friend. I use mine for a 12x12 room & 10x18 camp hut. It is very easy to clean & dump out the water. Low noise volume as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth considering for a small space
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the product because I've found that the exhaust fan alone is not eliminating the humidity in my bathroom. Unfortunately, there is not a huge space in the bathroom itself to put an industrial sized unit, so I settled on this unit that sits on my counter. So far, it seems to be working just fine. It does make a small amount of noise, but the unit can be easily turned off. I also needed to contact Gurin customer service, via their Web site, and got a very quick response.
customer_reviews.author: Broc A. Hite

customer_reviews.title: Reliable. Durable. Effective.
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered my second “Gurin Thermo-Electric Dehumidifier - 1100 Cubic Feet.” It is quiet, efficient, and reliably dehumidifies my basement office. My previous Gurin was originally purchased to dehumidify a leaky RV, and ran continuously for nearly 4 years, both in the RV and eventually my current office. I'm impressed with its durability.
customer_reviews.author: D. D. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Machine for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a dehumidifier before, so I have nothing to compare it to. Right away, I did see water collecting in the collectors cup. The room where I put it in my basement smells a whole lot better. I have checked the paper that I keep in this space for paper crafting and everything is fine. I think it's a very excellent machine for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Wambui Bey

customer_reviews.title: Quits working!
customer_reviews.text: Quit working after 14 months and of course out of warranty period. Reading the reviews of this device, I should not have wasted my money. I would not buy this unit.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this in our main bathroom for 3 years. Our house has crawl space and has lots of humidity where we live. Humidifier has helped keep humidity much lower in the bath. Customer service is very good. The power supply went bad after couple of years. The company replaced the unit itself at no charge.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but puts off very warm air.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but puts off very warm air. Clean it often! For best results!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Stewart

customer_reviews.title: I just bought another one because I was so happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I could write a long review, but I'll keep it simple! First off - I bought this thing expecting it to be a piece of junk that didn't work. I just bought another one because I was so happy with it. I use to control humidity in a boat cabin.
customer_reviews.author: PetePetePete

customer_reviews.title: ... in a bathroom in my basement and still works great. Once in a while after I dump the ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for almost 6 months now in a bathroom in my basement and still works great. Once in a while after I dump the tank and turn it back on it makes a loud noise so I turn it off and let it sit for a while and when I turn it back on the noise is usually gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable- Barely lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working shortly after after one-year warranty expired. Won’t even turn on. Safe your money and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Sbro

customer_reviews.title: The dehumidifier works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the dehumidifier for my 25' travel trailer. I have not used it in my trailer yet, but have tested it in my home. The unit is easy to use and its compact size is great for small areas. It is very quiet and well made. Based on the way it has functioned so far I would purchase another one should I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel trailer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dehumidifier for our travel trailer. It’s perfect. Small, compact, effective, and priced appropriately. I like the automatic cut-off feature when water chamber has reached capacity. Will probably purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Denise C.

customer_reviews.title: Looks well made and it's fairly quiet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool little dehumidifier. Looks surprisingly well made for the price. Hopefully it will work as good as it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: It does take water out of the air. Slowly. About 4 days for a full tank. Something you’d use for a closet, not a room.
customer_reviews.author: kevin sweet

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: humid area in bed room. light changes colr when time to empty. no fuss no mess. easy to empty
customer_reviews.author: Luellen Miller

customer_reviews.title: Works nice for the bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: Great for our cold bathroom that runs damp in winter and fall. It't made a difference in that our towels dry and it takes the damp chill out of the air. Not so great for bedrooms though -too slow! Oh, and be sure to clean the vents with a q-tip and tweezers/pliers occasionally to keep the air flowing!
customer_reviews.author: mr.snickersmom

customer_reviews.title: Works great in my RV
customer_reviews.text: Took the moisture out of our RV. What a pleasure
customer_reviews.author: Frannie

customer_reviews.title: Good device, quite, and compact. Need more reliable electric adapter
customer_reviews.text: It really work, and very low noise. The electric adapter need to be improved on longevity. The device malfunction mostly resulted from the bad electric adapter and not the device itself. Just buy extra adapter as spare to avoid usage interruption.
customer_reviews.author: KQ

customer_reviews.title: RV buy this product
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for all RV we bought this unit 3 1/2 year ago and thought it was a good idea to have a spare. We run it all day except for 2 1/2 months a year due to extreme temps. The RV is never damp works great. Being so compact we're able to leave it on our counter. Easy to empty runs quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Great for boats!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this little dehumidifier. I have a lower lazzarette in my boat that tends to hold damp air and while i was only using one for the longest time the two of these units keep the provisions dry. Couldn't be happier with the performance and the amount of water they pull out of that environment. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Rob P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The Gurin compact dehumidifier, DHMD-210 is a great addition to our bathroom. It handles the excess moisture from showering, etc. Product came packaged well and works flawlessly. I purchased it to remove the moisture that forms on the I side of our bathroom window. It takes care of that with ease. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy D Mason

customer_reviews.title: https: //smile. amazon. com/dp/B01A1EGYHM/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_4 Works as indicated ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as indicated. This was a replacement for the same model that I had that worked for a year but decided not to work anymore. I did like the size, quietness and was pleased with it overall. So, for now I give it 5 stars but it is being monitored to see how long this one works before it dies.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Dougan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the effort.
customer_reviews.text: May be good for dehumidifying a footlocker by not much more. Itvran 24 hours on a humid day and collected about an ounce of water. Threw mine in the trash
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: This little dehumidifier is a work horse. I just ...
customer_reviews.text: This little dehumidifier is a work horse. I just received it. Placed it in the attic HVAC closet. I can tell the difference already after only a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Zippy

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dehumidifier. I used it in our old smaller basement to eliminate some of the musty smell. It works well and is very quiet. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Works!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I live in the Smoky Mountains in a little camper which has very high humidity. I empty it daily, and its the perfect size for this little place!! I am so much more comfortable with this on!!!
customer_reviews.author: Darling Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: This worked great especially eliminating the sour towel smell, unfortunately it lasted about 7 months. Tried to buy a new plug adapter to no avail. So I purchased another one. Same thing; worked great but did not last a year . I would not recommend this. Trying a new brand now.
customer_reviews.author: margharite Petite

customer_reviews.title: It works well as described; however, it works ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well as described; however, it works slowly. Using such a small dehumidified does remove moisture and does convert it to a disposable liquid, but the process requires the motor to run more than a day to collect a few ounces. .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overclockable
customer_reviews.text: So I opened this thing up to see if I could put a more powerful peltier and fan in it. Turns out everything inside is in fact rated to 12v, not 9v! A simple swap of power supplies and it now is supercharged. I'm using it in a 3D printer enclosure in order to keep the filament dry.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Payne

customer_reviews.title: compact, quiet, and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: quiet, works really well. I had been buying disposable dehumidifiers, but this is definitely a superior product. easy to clean out, then turn back on. Like that it stops when full. Keeps the water from overflowing and making a mess
customer_reviews.author: Bri S.

customer_reviews.title: but if you expect this to be useful for much more than a small
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to, but if you expect this to be useful for much more than a small, small bedroom, you'd be better off buying a large model
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Have it in our vented store room where ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Have it in our vented store room where we live right by the bay. It is very humid here on the Texas coast line and it is doing it's job. We have to empty it out about every 3 days. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jodee

customer_reviews.title: It worked amazing so I got one for each room
customer_reviews.text: I just moved into a basement apartment and started looking up healthy ways to live in it. & of course, it suggested a Dehumidifier! SO thank you for the reviews because of it I first got 1 for my daughter's room. It worked amazing so I got one for each room. Worth the buy!!! Its small and cute for small and medium rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works perfect for my bathroom (which has no fan/vent)
customer_reviews.text: It works perfect for my bathroom (which has no fan/vent). It is so quiet that I can only hear it when I'm in the bathroom and the house is quiet. I only have to empty it once a week. It's just like they claimed. Love it. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D. Bullard

customer_reviews.title: Thirsty Little Giant
customer_reviews.text: After struggling with mold on leather purses, shoes, and jackets in spite of faithfully hanging those moisture collectors, leaving the closet light on, and trying a variety of other purchases and home remedies to fight closet humidity in an old house in Florida, I've found the solution. It's perfect for my 5 x 8 foot area and removes about 8 ounces of water every other day. Love this little guy!
customer_reviews.author: DoesLoveDogs

customer_reviews.title: Great for closets
customer_reviews.text: Small but mighty! Great for closets, entryways, laundry rooms or any other small spots that collect a lot of moisture. The small hole in the top of the reservoir ensures you don't spill, but at the cost of slowing you down when it is time to empty. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Tomassetti

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a new gun safe to protect the guns and documents from moisture. Check it every 2 to 4 days to dump the water out. Easy to pull the container out of the device and reinstall. This was not very expensive and works great. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Her5ndon

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy with my order.
customer_reviews.text: I received my Gurin Thermo-Electric Dehumidifier only to find that the green indicator light turns on but nothing happens. Seriously disappointed. This is the first time that I have received something from Amazon that hasn't worked out for me. Now, I have to go through the hoops to get a replacement. Not at all happy.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa F.

product_meta.title: Gurin Thermo Electric Mini Dehumidifier, 1100 Cubic Feet, Peltier Technology Dehumidifier Compact and Portable for High Humidity in Home, Kitchen, Bedroom, Basement, Caravan, Office, Garage
feature_bullets: SMALL & COMPACT, THERMOELECTRIC DEHUMIDIFIER FOR HIGH HUMIDITY–Low energy consumption dehumidifier, light weight, compact small dehumidifier and Portable – FAN: 3” X 3” DC Brushless motor,removes up to 8 ounces of water a day with a 16-ounce water tank capacity. Perfect for rooms up to 1100 cubic feet.

DEHUMIDIFIER FOR HIGH HUMIDITY WITH AUTO SHUT OFF: Gurin Electric Compact Dehumidifier with whisper quiet technology dehumidifier. When full the dehumidifier automatically shuts off and the LED light will turns-on indicating the water tank needs to be drained. Simply empty the water tank and put it back into the dehumidifier. Power adaptor: 9V DC 2.5Amp

ULTRA-QUIET & EFFICIENT ELECTRIC DEHUMIDIFIER: Thermo electric dehumidifier with built-in Thermo-Electric Cooling Technology. Power consumption: 22.5. (Peltier) operates without a compressor meaning whisper quiet operation in bedrooms, bathrooms and offices.

PELTIER TECHNOLOGY DEHUMIDIFIER: REMOVES 8 OUNCES OF MOISTURE/DAY: Bedroom Dehumidifier and Air Purifier. Capacity: Approximately 8 oz per day at 86F, 80% RH. Product Dimension: 6” (W) x 8.5” (W) x 5”. Optimal function in room sizes up to 1100 cubic feet. Thermoelectric Peltier Module Dehumidifier.

DEHUMIDIFIER CUBIC FEET, LOWERS HUMIDITY: Dehumidifier Automatic Shut OFF: Peltier Technology Dehumidifier. Bathroom Dehumidifier for High Humidity. Ideal in your home, kitchen, bathroom, bedroom, garage, closet, caravan. Removable water tank: 16oz Tank. Like all mini dehumidifiers, optimal operating temperature is 59-86°F. It will not work below 41°F.
